test_scenarios.name: Verify Homepage Loads and Navigation
steps: Verify Header and Footer elements are displayed.
Click on 'Men's' category in navigation bar
test_scenarios.expected_result: Homepage loads successfully.  Header and Footer elements are present. Men's product listing page is displayed.

test_scenarios.name: Search for Product and View Details
steps: Enter 'Air Force 1' in the search bar and press Enter.
Click on the first product displayed in the search results.
test_scenarios.expected_result: Search results page displays relevant products. Product details page for 'Air Force 1' is displayed.

test_scenarios.name: Add to Cart and Initiate Checkout
steps: On the product details page, select a size and click 'Add to Cart'.
Click 'View Cart' in the cart notification.
test_scenarios.expected_result: Product is added to the cart.  Cart page loads successfully. Checkout page loads successfully.
